00225 
00226 void FillStandardTileSet(TileSet *tileSet)
00227 {
00228       BlokusTile *tiles = new BlokusTile[NUM_TILES];
00229 
00230       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NUM_TILES; ++i)
00231       {
00232             tiles[i].setTile(&StandardTiles[i]);
00233             tiles[i].setScore(StandardScore[i]);
00234             tiles[i].setAmount(1);
00235       }
00236 
00237       tileSet->setTileAmount(NUM_TILES);
00238       tileSet->setTileList(tiles);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void DestroyStandardTiles()
00242 {
00243       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NUM_TILES; ++i)
00244             TileDestroy(&StandardTiles[i]);
00245 }
